song.englishname: He Who Began a Good Work in You

english.segment1: Chorus. He who began a good work in you. He who began a good work in you. Will be faithful to complete it. He'll be faithful to complete it. He who started the work. Will be faithful to complete it in you
english.segment2: If the struggle you're facing. Is slowly replacing your hope. With despair. Or the process is long. And you're losing your song. In the night
english.segment3: Chorus. He who began a good work in you. He who began a good work in you. Will be faithful to complete it. He'll be faithful to complete it. He who started the work. Will be faithful to complete it in you
english.segment4: If the struggle you're facing. Is slowly replacing your hope. With despair. Or the process is long. And you're losing your song. In the night. You can be sure that the Lord. Has His hand on you. Safe and secure. He will never abandon you. You are His treasure. And He finds His pleasure in you
english.segment5: Repeat Chorus. You can be sure that the Lord. Has His hand on you. Safe and secure. He will never abandon you. You are His treasure. And He finds His pleasure in you
